infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to place trees on the map.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app uses motion sensors to measure tree height with the clinometer.

plugins.cameraPermission: This app needs camera access to measure tree trunk with a credit card reference.

plugins.photosPermission: This app needs photo library access to measure tree trunk from saved photos.
